DOC.brief_title: Prognosis Of Patients With Aggressive B-Cell Lymphoma , Treated With Rituximab+Anthracycline Regimen
DOC.criteria: 1 . Histologically confirm newly diagnose aggressive Bcell lymphoma accord current World Health Organisation Classification , 2001 2007 . 2 . Any stage disease . 3 . Treatment RCHOP RCHOP like regimen ( +/ transplant ) . 4 . Age least 18 year . 5 . Availability tissue biopsy diagnosis possible centralized revision . 6 . Availability data clinical involvement , laboratory , treatment follow .
